thread.title: BlackRock Co-President Charles S. Hallac Dies
thread.title_full: BlackRock Co-President Charles S. Hallac Dies - WSJ

author: Tess Stynes
title: BlackRock Co-President Charles S. Hallac Dies
text:
BlackRock Inc. said 27-year company veteran and co-president, Charles S. Hallac, has died after a long battle with cancer.
The money-management company said on Wednesday that Mr. Hallac, 50, joined the company in 1988 and was one of its first employees. He helped build the firmâ€™s technological and operational foundation.
